children.value: InputPassword is used to display a secure password input field.

Use InputPassword for authentication flows where the user is required to enter a
password.

If you are building an experience for authentication that does not require
character-masking, consider using

<Playground>
  {() => {
    const [value, setValue] = useState("password");
    return (
      <InputPassword value={value} onChange={setValue} placeholder="Password" />
    );
  }}
</Playground>

<Playground>
  <InputPassword
    placeholder="Password"
    name="password"
    validations={{
      required: {
        value: true,
        message: "You need a password.",
      },
      minLength: {
        value: 10,
        message: "Passwords should be at least 10 characters.",
      },
    }}
  />
</Playground>
